He was homeless, but eventually he got a car so he could sell from the boot. And by the 1980s, he was a millionaire wholesaling to companies like Topshop. So in a way, fashion put me in England.
author: M.I.A.

quote: I am so pathetic with machines in real life, it's not a joke. I'd rather walk, or even run, than take the car out myself. I like to be driven around. Yes, I like fancy cars, and fancy bikes, too. It's my dream to learn how to ride one myself, but for now, I am content being driven around.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: The problem with the auto industry is layered upon the lack of consumer confidence. People are not buying cars. I don't care whether they're or American cars, or international cars.
author: Jennifer Granholm

quote: Women feel like we're fat if we can't wear the clothes we wore in high school. Men, in contrast, only start to feel fat only when they can no longer fit into a foreign car.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: When cars honk and hoot and drunks squeeze out of car windows and scream, you can be sure that football is in the air.
author: Craig Brown

quote: It's been invigorating being back on the West Coast, being at Alphabet, because there is so much innovation. And the big challenge is, how do you think about resource allocation and priorities when you have so many great options? But wearing jeans instead of suits and popping into driverless cars has also been a lot of fun.
author: Ruth Porat

quote: I love the practicality of a good car. You know what I mean? And when I say 'practicality,' I mean the complete practicality of a Ferrari 458, a wonderfully fantastic every day car.
author: Hunter Hayes

quote: Take air quality in the United States today: It's about 30 percent better than it was 25 years ago, even though there are now more people driving more cars.
author: Jared Diamond

quote: My dad used to love Steely Dan, the Stones, Jethro Tull and all that. There was always Steely Dan going in my dad's car, but I remember The Royal Scam in particular because it has 'Kid Charlemagne' on it.
author: St. Vincent

quote: I used to do films for money earlier. I never knew what perception meant. I didn't give too much attention to scripts. It was either to buy a house or to buy a car. There was a certain frivolity to the way I used to pick up things. I wasn't taking my career seriously.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: Consumers may put off buying a car, but they don't put off buying a vacation.
author: Dara Khosrowshahi

quote: I'm carded for R-rated movies. And I get talked down to a lot. When I try to go rent a car or buy an airplane ticket or other stuff adults do, I get 'Okaaaaaay, honey.' I remember when I was 18, getting crayons in a restaurant.
author: Kristen Bell

quote: With this film, 'Need For Speed,' with this, we had a blank canvas to work with. What we had to do was have fast cars, and that's it.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: My father's a Southern Baptist minister. I wasn't lighting cars on fire; I just wasn't.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: I'm a big believer in everybody being themselves. If not doing a swimsuit calendar is yourself, that's great. But if doing a swimsuit calendar is yourself, then you should be able to do it. What I do outside the car adds to who I am and expresses a different side of me.
author: Danica Patrick

quote: Why make a movie about Ayrton Senna? Someone who drove around in circles at 200mph in a car that looked like a giant cigarette packet? Why would anyone who isn't already a fan of Formula 1 care?
author: Asif Kapadia

quote: There are no drivers like Formula One drivers. They are engineers, in a way. They are driving manual cars one-handed at 200 miles per hour around streets in Monaco. These cars use the ultimate in technology.
author: Asif Kapadia

quote: Doorman - a genius who can open the door of your car with one hand, help you in with the other, and still have one left for the tip.
author: Dorothy Kilgallen

quote: I was once in a very, very bad car accident. So my drawing arm is full of pins and platinum stuff. Occasionally it hurts. But I found that after the arm was put back together I could draw better than before. I have no idea why.
author: Bernard Tschumi

quote: When you put gas in your car you are making a political statement, because you are supporting the empires that control and continue the destruction of some countries.
author: Javier Bardem

quote: I seem to be stuck in the '60s, and my favorite music, cars, and women's fashion come from that era. And the sense of social rebellion. It was a good time for a lot of things.
author: Amber Heard

quote: Nobody tells you when success comes around; in its transient way, you're just working and exhausted all the time. Sometimes I think I'm just sleeping in the back of cars, d'you know what I mean?
author: James Corden

quote: The best place for me is in my car, listening to my stereo. I am 'Mr. Karaoke Guy' in the car, completely. I just go with it and don't care what anyone else thinks - I'm singing, man!
author: Drake Bell

quote: Have you ever noticed how nice people are at the car wash?! Maybe it's just me, but it makes me happy. Weird, I know!
author: Brittany Snow

quote: ER was one of my favourites. I played a car accident victim who has leukemia. I got to wear a neck brace and nose tubes for the two days I worked.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: When you think of bike couriers, you think of hyper speed. They get paid by how fast they can drop stuff off. The faster you go, the more chances you take. And the more chances you take, the greater the war between cyclists and cars.
author: Dan Hill

quote: Cyclists. I really hate them. I wish they would not be so self-righteous and realise they are a danger to pedestrians. I wish cyclists would not vindictively snap off wing mirrors on cars when they were trying to cross in front of the car at a danger to motorists and pedestrians.
author: A. S. Byatt

quote: If I could choose any car in the world, I'd get a Lamborghini, but I think that's a bit too much money. I'll start off with maybe a V8 or something.
author: Kodi Smit-McPhee

quote: A couple times a year, I get in the car, and I'll drive 1,000 miles cross-country, going through side streets. I'll stay off the highways as much as possible. And I realize it's a huge country, and for us to be in so many places in the country is an amazing thing.
author: Fred DeLuca

quote: Anyone who wants to promote a car or a football tournament turns to opera. There's a much greater public connection than the image of plush corporate boxes would suggest.
author: Rory Bremner

quote: Alphabet would be a holding company to house its wackier or noncore efforts - like its Verily life sciences, Waymo self-driving cars, and Loon Internet balloon projects - while Google's advertising-oriented business would stand apart and continue to drive the company's finances.
author: Adam Lashinsky

quote: I didn't have my first car until after the end of my senior year. I got a Yukon Sport.
author: Tim Duncan

quote: I loved problems on paper, and I was good at math, but I was a mechanical engineer, and I never understood - or cared to - how a car worked.
author: Rabih Alameddine

quote: Growing up in Southern California, it's all car culture. When I was a kid, I knew every single model of every single car dealer; I knew every style of every year.
author: Cheech Marin

quote: We always kept believing in ourselves and our team and the car.
author: Sebastian Vettel

quote: I wanted to be a race car driver when I was a kid.
author: Alfie Allen

quote: My older brother gave me a cassette tape of Mr. Bungle, and I couldn't stop listening to it. I used to drive around Colorado in a Mustang II - it was when they got away from the muscle-car Mustangs, so it was sort of old lady. I couldn't go above 45 mph in that car, but I would drive around listening to Mr. Bungle.
author: Derek Cianfrance

quote: I look at safety as, you know, there's active and passive. Passive is how do you survive a crash. Active is accident avoidance. And so that's real-time information to you, as a driver, and to your car, to the wheels of a car that will get you out of a bad situation.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: It is true that rich people can spend more money than middle class people, but there's this upper limit on what we can spend. I drive a very nice car, but it's only one car. I don't own a thousand, even though I earn a thousand times the median wage. I have a few jackets, not a few thousand.
author: Nick Hanauer

quote: It's hard to store natural gas. And it does require big storage tanks. So it doesn't work very well on passenger cars.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: The Ford Motor Co. should stand for something more than cars and trucks. There is a Ford way of doing things that we cannot lose... We need to be continuously polishing that Ford oval.
author: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: The years I raced in were fantastic. There was so much change in the cars. We went from treaded tyres to no wings right through to slicks to enormous wings.
author: Jackie Stewart

quote: In New York, you've got Donald Trump, Woody Allen, a crack addict and a regular Joe, and they're all on the same subway car.
author: Ethan Hawke

quote: The image is where you have dinner at night, who you're seeing. It's what car you drive and how you dress. People in the industry sell that, and it creates a dream. There's nothing else.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: I was very lucky growing up, and I got all my dad's and aunts' toys from the 1950s and 1960s and loved those old pedal cars.
author: Jasmine Guinness

quote: I'm a total petrolhead. My three brothers and I used to ride scrambling bikes in the field near where we lived. We all liked cars. I've always loved the smell of an engine.
author: Jennifer Saunders

quote: Well, you can say there is a self driving car. I'm seeing the automation of vehicles. Really, computer-assisted driving. I think that is really interesting to us because we are taking all of the sensors technologies and putting them in cars and making people safer.
author: Tony Fadell

quote: The Russian revolution is one of history's car wrecks. We do know the ending, but we continue to watch. It expresses aspects of human nature we find unacceptable.
author: Kathryn Harrison

quote: Music scores your life. You interact with it. You listen to it in the car. It becomes the soundtrack to that one summer with that one girl.
author: Chris Milk

quote: Deprived of the opportunity to judge one another by the cars we drive, New Yorkers, thrown together daily on mass transit, form silent opinions based on our choices of subway reading. Just by glimpsing the cover staring back at us, we can reach the pinnacle of carnal desire or the depths of hatred. Soul mate or mortal enemy.
author: David Rakoff

quote: In this industry, you have to have passion. It's tough; there's no mercy. But I just love cars - I love to bring a new car to market. And every time I do this, it gets a little easier.
author: Henrik Fisker

quote: Being broke and poor - I mean, you grow up in the environment I grew up in, grew up hard and grew up poor. Your mom doesn't have a car until you make it to the NBA... no telephone. So, I mean, if you grow up like that, and you're able to make it to this level and be blessed the way I've been blessed, it's always great to give back.
author: Tyronn Lue

quote: I live a fairly simple life, and that didn't change much after I sold TechCrunch in 2010. I didn't buy a new house or even a new car. The one thing I did splurge on was a boat. Nothing too fancy or large.
author: Michael Arrington

quote: When I see a car I've designed going down the street and somebody admiring it, that's a nice feeling.
author: Henrik Fisker

quote: The market needs a super car with no excuses.
author: Henrik Fisker

quote: I always loved cars. I used to play 'Need for Speed' all the time... any racing game.
author: Afrojack

quote: If you tell people, 'that old banger of yours, we're going to tax the hell out of it,' they'll rightly tell you to get lost. But if you tell people that when they next buy a car, the tax will be adjusted so that the cleanest ones will cost less and the polluting ones will cost more, most people would say 'fair enough.'
author: Zac Goldsmith

quote: Life's too short when you find yourself sitting in a car for four hours every day trying to get from East L.A. to West L.A. to Hollywood and then back to East L.A.
author: Garrett Hedlund

quote: The way you continue to be a successful business is you don't wait for the car to go off the cliff. You have to manage yourself. And make sure you do it in the right way so you are not making decisions in crisis.
author: Roger Goodell

quote: Adults are locked into car payments and divorces and work. They haven't got time to think fresh.
author: Gary Paulsen

quote: Nothing impresses the ladies like a clean, pressed pair of khakis and a large pattern shirt featuring either classic cars, mojitos or men playing golf.
author: Tim Heidecker

quote: I was trying for years to woo people through humour, but it seems flash cars are much easier.
author: Stephen Merchant

quote: I've always had an affinity and a passion for cars and that whole car culture.
author: Ludacris

quote: I love Lady Antebellum and Miranda Lambert - they write from the heart. But it's hard to find a country music lover in L.A. None of my friends really listen to it, and they hate getting in the car with me because I just blast Taylor Swift.
author: Lucy Hale

quote: Sometimes people are looking for, 'What's the next Tesla car? What's this really cool, super-specific thing that people are going to want?' But I try to be just like a Ford truck. They sell a lot more Ford trucks than they do Tesla cars.
author: Luke Combs

quote: I myself, as well as Toyota, am not perfect. I, more than anyone, wish for our customers' cars to be safe.
author: Akio Toyoda

quote: As a driver, you always want to be in the car getting as much experience as possible; especially when there's something new like different tyres.
author: Romain Grosjean

quote: Monaco is quite a specialist track, and it is very difficult to say if a car will be suited to it or not. It's bumpy on the straights, and it's a very low-grip surface. All these things mean that you never know what to expect.
author: Romain Grosjean

quote: I'm a casual F1 racing fan. I'm probably more of a stock car, NASCAR guy.
author: Robin Zander

quote: I took to heart the instructions my father drilled into my head. Respect the customer. Pay attention to her. Take her package to her car. You broke your neck to get what she wanted because you never knew when the next customer would come along.
author: Stanley Marcus

quote: I never listen to music in the house, I listen to music in the car.
author: Peter Tork

quote: Bond doesn't have an inner life. There would be moments when I'd think, 'We need to gather our thoughts here and have a breather,' where in another novel you'd slow the pace, have some description and see what Bond feels about this. But Bond doesn't reflect. All you can do is move on to the next bomb or shark or car.
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: I'm a racer at heart more than anything else, and that will always be my priority: competing. But ultimately, if you can't drive, you can still have the competitive spirit outside of a car.
author: Jacques Villeneuve

quote: A male gynecologist is like an auto mechanic who has never owned a car.
author: Carrie Snow

quote: Some ways of using our thinking are really inspiring. There are people who use their thinking to race cars. People use their thinking to build rockets to the moon. It's all just a use of your thinking.
author: Michael Nesmith

quote: I'm not a car guy. The subway gets me where I need to go efficiently and cheaply, and I don't worry about traffic.
author: Joe Scarborough

quote: A Fiat Panda, it's the best car in the world.
author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quote: I have a real passion for driving. Earlier on in my life I wanted to be a race car driver. But I don't pay an extortionate amount of money for cars. I'm pretty frugal.
author: John Barrowman

quote: I wish people would spend their money on hybrid cars.
author: Ryan Tedder

quote: My approach is to start from the straightforward principle that our body is a machine. A very complicated machine, but none the less a machine, and it can be subjected to maintenance and repair in the same way as a simple machine, like a car.
author: Aubrey de Grey

quote: I still don't have a car. I still travel by public transport. I take autos to travel to and fro for recordings.
author: Arijit Singh

quote: They put chains on me; they chained my waist, my legs. Put me in the back of a squad car, and I literally blacked out. I didn't even - there's whole pieces missing.
author: Jim Bakker

quote: While I'm driving, I've got speed, gear, lap time, water temperature, blood sugar, RPM, oil pressure. I've got car data and body data all together. It's all on the dash.
author: Charlie Kimball

quote: Now, personally, I like a car with some sort of character.
author: Richard Hammond

quote: On the dance floor, as much as you say, 'Ladies, you are the car. He is the driver. You can only go where he takes you,' they still try to be in control.
author: Len Goodman

quote: Driving race cars was an avenue for me to learn how to build my own car, and that was my ambition all along.
author: Carroll Shelby

quote: The reason I moved to California the first time was to build the Cobra. I thought it was stupid to have a 1918 taxicab engine in what Europeans like to call a performance car when a little American V-8 could do the job better.
author: Carroll Shelby

quote: The Cobra is my personal favorite car. The original 289 Cobra is the car I respect the most. I like to drive the 289 better than the 427.
author: Carroll Shelby

quote: Videogames are indeed design: They're sophisticated virtual machines that echo the mechanical systems inside cars.
author: John Maeda

quote: I listen to KCRW in the car and Pandora radio, which I stream through the stereo from my iPhone. I've been listening to everything from Caribou to Conway Twitty. If I'm going on a longer car ride, I'll download some podcasts.
author: Sam Trammell

quote: In my job, I have many operations, so I tend to use time in my car to think. I get in the car after work and drive all night -11 hours, Vancouver to Banff.
author: Jim Pattison

quote: I am very puzzled by the fact that young people are getting infected again. They don't take precautions despite an enormous amount of information. It's like riding a race car at 200 kilometers an hour. Some people like the risk.
author: Luc Montagnier

quote: In 1940, President Roosevelt called on American industry to become the 'great arsenal of democracy.' Automotive manufacturers in Michigan responded and converted their assembly lines from cars to tanks and helped America win World War II.
author: Sander Levin

quote: There are many role models I've been around, and kind of the biggest one - there's a show called 'Push Girls,' with all women in wheelchairs, and they're all really good friends of mine. And one, Angela Rockwood, is still modeling, in a wheelchair. After a car accident.
author: Jamie Brewer

quote: The independence once represented by the car has been replaced by cell phones and social networks, which are now at the forefront of people's expression of freedom and access. Once a symbol of 'coming of age,' many drivers are waiting longer to get their licenses.
author: John Zimmer

quote: Family trips to Yellowstone and to what are now national parks in Southern Utah, driving the primitive roads and cars of that day, were real adventures.
author: Paul D. Boyer

quote: If 'Chicago Fire' goes for a long run, maybe I'll look for a place, but in my line of work, you can't throw your eggs into one basket because you might have to move. I'm not big on 'things,' though, so I don't own TVs, couches or cars because I wouldn't know where to put them.
author: Taylor Kinney

quote: It's fine if you're making 1,000 or 2,000 of an electric car, and I think there is value in that in a lot of ways, but it's not going to have a big dent in oil consumption in the country, or CO2 emissions.
author: Rick Wagoner

quote: The GTO is such an important car because it's a racing car and a touring car and that's pretty unusual.
author: Nick Mason

quote: There's not a day that goes by that I don't bless myself with holy water and then get in my car and rub the medal of the Virgin Mary that she gave me and say a Hail Mary for my mother. And then I kiss her Mass card that's right there on the dashboard.
author: Peter Criss

quote: I was brought up in a car family, my dad loved cars and I was taught the art of making an Austin 7 operate.
author: Nick Mason

quote: It's like watching a car accident, that reality TV.
author: Enrico Colantoni

quote: In Toronto, I grew up taking a subway, I grew up taking a bus. I spent my formative adult years in New York City, walking the streets, taking the subway. You're connected to the larger whole. L.A. is so spread out, and you're so incubated inside those cars and it's so exhausting to deal with the traffic, without really having the human contact.
author: Enrico Colantoni

quote: Al Gore, the former vice-president of the United States, lives in a mansion that uses more electricity than the average family's bungalow! David Suzuki rides on a bus that uses more fuel than a Smart car to get across Canada! Oh my God! And this is just the tip of the vanishing iceberg!
author: Linwood Barclay

quote: Google is working on self-driving cars, and they seem to work. People are so bad at driving cars that computers don't have to be that good to be much better.
author: Marc Andreesen

quote: About 60 percent of the oil consumed daily by Americans is used for transportation, and about 45 percent is used for passenger cars and light trucks.
author: Sherwood Boehlert

quote: Growing up in the Midwest, people don't drive Porsches and Ferraris. They drive Fords and Chevys. And so even if you have the opportunity to buy a more expensive car, it doesn't occur to you because it's not what you relate to.
author: Luke Perry

quote: The top golfers in the world are like Formula One cars when it comes to their swings.
author: Stuart Appleby

quote: The problem was Le Corbusier was a genius and an enormous artist, but he tried to resolve problems to which there is no solution. So the idea to demolish the centre of Paris in order to adapt it to the car - he drew it! - is something not even the most bloody dictators conceived.
author: Leon Krier

quote: The hardest part was when I was in high school not having a job and always being broke. I had to get to auditions without a car. I either took the bus or walked.
author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

quote: One of the points in which I was especially interested was the Jim Crow regulations, that is, the system of separation of the races in street cars and railroad trains.
author: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: Why shouldn't a car key look like a car?
author: Franz von Holzhausen

quote: When kids my age were picking up toy cars, I used to buy toy guns.
author: Gagan Narang

quote: In America, people buy cars, and they put very little money down. They get a car, and they go to work. The work pays them a salary; the salary allows them to pay for the car over time. The car pays for itself.
author: Iqbal Quadir

quote: I drive the car pool - I show up with no makeup and drive the kids to school.
author: Jane Clayson

quote: In high school, during marathon phone conversations, cheap pizza dinners and long suburban car rides, I began to fall for boys because of who they actually were, or at least who I thought they might become.
author: J. Courtney Sullivan

quote: I wouldn't say design has become strictly functional. A lot of cars these days look downright comic book to me, and the info-gadgets with which late industrial people spend the most time - phones, music players, etc. - are blobjects.
author: Scott Westerfeld

quote: We've seen computers play chess and beat grand masters. We've seen computers drive a car across a desert. But interestingly, playing chess is easy, but having a conversation about nothing is really difficult for a computer.
author: Hod Lipson

quote: In real life, one of my friends was killed in a car accident during our sophomore year.
author: Beverley Mitchell

quote: I liken myself to Henry Ford and the auto industry, I give you 90 percent of what most people need.
author: Adam Osborne

quote: Latency is very important when you think about autonomous cars and things like that - 5G will really change the game, and I think will be another spike of growth in the wireless industry.
author: Lowell McAdam

quote: For a boy or girl, driving cars that they love is fun.
author: Luke Goss

quote: The appeal of the Golden Age heroes for me is their simplicity, even their naivety - they represent the fundamental building blocks of the whole superhero genre, whether it's a 'super' man able to lift cars, or a vigilante who terrorises criminals at night like Batman.
author: Adam Christopher

quote: Smokey and The Bandit was just a lark. All we did was run up and down those Georgia roads wrecking cars and having the time of our life.
author: Jerry Reed

quote: Getting ready to wrestle is like getting ready for a car crash. Getting ready to work with Brock Lesnar is like knowing you're going to get hit by a bus and the bus is going to back over you. If I'm going to work 'WrestleMania,' 16 weeks out I have to start training like I'm Mayweather getting ready for a fight.
author: Triple H

quote: There are many people in the world who feel that if only they had a bigger car, a nicer house, better vacations, a more understanding boss, or a more interesting partner, then their life would work. We all go through that one. Slowly we wear out most of our 'if onlies.'
author: Joko Beck

quote: The car resembles a dragon fly or any other jumping animal that moves shorter distances in straight lines and then changes its direction at different points.
author: Fritz Todt

quote: I cleanse, tone and moisturize twice a day. I exfoliate once a week and carry makeup wipes in the car for freshening up.
author: Sasha Jackson

quote: When the car's going well, I purr like a kitten.
author: Buddy Rice

quote: We must move away from our dependency on fossil fuels, and I am glad that GM has invested over $1 billion in hydrogen fuel cells cars to meet this goal.
author: Albert Wynn

quote: Yes, my grandfather worked with Thomas Edison on the electric car, and he sold electric cars at the 1900 World's Fair in Paris.
author: Al Jardine

quote: A car for every purse and purpose.
author: Alfred P. Sloan

quote: I have a need to make these sorts of connections literal sometimes, and a vehicle often helps to do that. I have a relationship to car culture. It isn't really about loving cars. It's sort of about needing them.
author: Matthew Barney

quote: Running on different types of racetracks is challenging - not only for the drivers, but even more for the team members who have to make adjustments to the cars before each race.
author: Michael Andretti

quote: The problem with not saving is it can often mean you're - a crisis away from, as we've seen in some cases, living in your car or losing your home or - having your lights shut off.
author: Derek Kilmer

quote: On the roads, it is one of those 'might is right' situations. If I see cars coming, I duck out of the way.
author: Dane Bird-Smith

quote: Environmentalists have a very conflicted relationship with their cars.
author: Tom Arnold

quote: Besides my love for horses and cars, I am passionate about making the cheapest vaccines in the world. I started making life-saving drugs when I was 22.
author: Cyrus S. Poonawalla

quote: Rappers aren't the really rich ones. We all have nice houses with studios and cars, but you need a piece of someone's business to be super wealthy.
author: Drake

quote: Even we schoolchildren know that ordinary diplomats don't drive around in unmarked cars carrying Glock pistols.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: My brother was a lifeguard in a car wash.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: I'm way flashier on Instagram and Snapchat because I feel like that's what people want to see, and that's I've always done, so I'm not going to stop. People want to see my cars and my purses. People love fashion. But that's so not me.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: I went to Zimbabwe. I know how white people feel in America now; relaxed! Cause when I heard the police car I knew they weren't coming after me!
author: Richard Pryor

quote: The greatest pleasure when I started making money was not buying cars or yachts but finding myself able to have as many freshly typed drafts as possible.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: I never saw anything funny in a car commercial - but that's OK. Whatever they wanted to do - it's their product and I'm the spokesperson, and I'm going to deliver.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Restrictions on mobility will be removed as cars become driverless. We'll be chauffeured, basically.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: I take a lot of pride in the work I do, because people pay to see me. They've got to get babysitters, park their car, get popcorn and candy. I've got to be conscious of that.
author: Mr. T

quote: I'm starting to think about things that I want to do, things that are fun. One of them is driving a car like a Porsche. I've driven a lot of cars - sedans, trucks and big family vehicles all year long. But there's nothing like a four-wheel-drive Porsche.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: My boyfriend keeps telling me I've got to own things. So, first I bought this car. And then he told me I oughta get a house. 'Why a house?' 'Well, you gotta have a place to park the car.'
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I have a nice car, a Mercedes. And then I have an old El Camino truck that I'm crazy about. I like to get in that truck and go up in the hills near where I live, in Vegas, and take my camera. That, to me, is Heaven, being out in nature, taking pictures of the wildlife.
author: B. B. King

quote: American stuntmen are smart - they think about safety. When they do a jump in a car, they calculate everything: the speed, the distance... But in Hong Kong, we don't know how to count. Everything we do is a guess. If you've got the guts, you do it. All of my stuntmen have gotten hurt.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: Roads get wider and busier and less friendly to pedestrians. And all of the development based around cars, like big sprawling shopping malls. Everything seems to be designed for the benefit of the automobile and not the benefit of the human being.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: Because I grew up in such tight spaces, I don't get manicures, pedicures. I'm not into cars, but I am into a fabulous house. I wanted the spiral staircase, clean sheets on the bed, to be able to take a shower.
author: Viola Davis

quote: I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Chrysler builds great cars.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: I live, I shop almost exclusively on the Internet. I've bought cars on the Internet. I watch television, I do everything on it. I even watch my son online.
author: Tom Ford

quote: I don't want to argue with my wife about her car - or my driving.
author: Dale Earnhardt

quote: Perhaps I'd like to design cars, but I don't think I'd be much good at it.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: No one in a novel by Virginia Woolf ever filled up the petrol tank of her car. No one in Hemingway's postwar novels ever worried about the effects of prolonged exposure to the threat of nuclear war.
author: J. G. Ballard

quote: Cars can have a hypnotic effect. You can get in a car and get out and not really remember the trip.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: First time I looked at a Formula One car in person, I just stared at the cockpit, figuring I'd never get in there. The drivers wear the whole car like a tight-fitting suit.
author: Chris Hemsworth

quote: I was filming 'The Avengers' when I got the call for 'Rush,' so I went from 215 pounds, which is how much I weigh when I'm playing Thor, down to about 185 pounds to be able to fit into the car. That was all in about four months.
author: Chris Hemsworth

quote: Removing the faults in a stage-coach may produce a perfect stage-coach, but it is unlikely to produce the first motor car.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: I talk to myself, especially in the car.
author: Chris Pine

quote: When I was a kid, the only way I saw movies was from the back seat of my family's car at the drive-in.
author: Forest Whitaker

quote: People are so bad at driving cars that computers don't have to be that good to be much better. Any time you stand in line at the D.M.V. and look around, you're like, Oh, my God, I wish all these people were replaced by computer drivers.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: I absolutely refuse to reveal my age. What am I - a car?
author: Cyndi Lauper

quote: I go to correctional facilities and talk to kids there. They have little kids in there who are, like, 12 years old, stealing cars and stuff like that.
author: Eazy-E

quote: The first thing I ever rode when I was a kid was a motorcycle, so I knew how to drive a motorcycle before a car.
author: John Travolta

quote: I think that's where the world is going. People will not own cars; they'll have a service that takes them where they want to go, when they want to go there. And that's what Uber is.
author: Travis Kalanick

quote: There will be a huge, huge positive impact for society when driverless cars become a thing.
author: Travis Kalanick

quote: I drove from L.A. to the bottom of Florida on Vespas, and I drove cross country multiple times in a car. I've done a lot of road tripping.
author: Armie Hammer

quote: I'm very free-spirited and crazy. I love to have fun, and I like doing stupid things. At the same time, I'm like a 35-year-old. I have a house. I have a car. I have a steady job. I have a business, and I have to make serious decisions.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: I grew up on the back of a motorcycle - my dad didn't have a car until I was a teenager.
author: Aisha Tyler

quote: We approach people the same way we approach our cars. We take the poor kid to a doctor and ask, What's wrong with him, how much will it cost, and when can I pick him up?
author: James Hillman

quote: I moved to Cardiff when I was 17 and never needed a car. When I came to L.A. for my first job there, I needed a car, so I had to pass my driving test.
author: Luke Evans

quote: In Japan, they have TV sets in cars right now, where you can punch up traffic routes, weather, everything! You can get Internet access already in cars in Japan, so within the next 2 to 3 years it's gonna be so crazy!
author: Glenn Danzig

quote: I love puns. I've been known to turn the car around just to take advantage of a good pun situation. It really is the highest form of humor.
author: Karin Slaughter

quote: I bought a lot of rubbish things that kids buy: skateboards and clothes and typical teenage stuff. And, as soon as I could, I wasted a lot of money on cars - BMW's mostly - for myself and my family.
author: Tom Felton

quote: I was a little troublemaker. Always trying to get in trouble, always mischief, like throwing rocks at cars when I was younger, all that kind of stuff.
author: Ryan Lochte

quote: When the Exxon Valdez spilled in 1989, I was angry. I even wrote on the back of my car, Boycott Exxon!
author: Alexandra Paul

quote: I still remember, when I got my fees for 'Barsaat,' I ran into a car showroom and purchased a Maruti Esteem. I treasure that car more than anything else in the world.
author: Twinkle Khanna

quote: When I was four, I just wanted to drive, I collected toy cars. Where does that sort of thing come from? In hindsight you go, 'Oh, liked it because of this.' Maybe it's just the wheel.
author: Michael Fassbender

quote: I am endlessly busy, bringing up five young kids, and trying to keep up with the three older ones. I still spend most of my life driving car pools.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: I've got a nice car. I love my job. I've got a bagel store, and I have breakfast every morning with friends I grew up with. I've been in movies, I've written books - I don't know how that all happened.
author: Larry King

quote: I traded my 2002 Silverado in for the Trailblazer, and after my second fight, I got a win bonus. It was the knockout-of-the-night bonus, $50,000, and I paid the rest of my car off, and I gave it to my mother because I had a sponsorship with a Chevy dealership.
author: Stipe Miocic

quote: Myself and my two younger sisters and brother were paid for any chores, whether it was washing pop's car, sweeping the lawn or picking mangoes.
author: Marie Helvin

quote: Food is not just what we put in our mouths to fill up; it is culture and identity. Reason plays some role in our decisions about food, but it's rarely driving the car.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: To be honest, I don't listen to much music! I've been so engrossed in it my whole life that when I drive around in my car, I'll listen to college lectures on philosophy and literature and world history, things like that, to kind of catch up on the college experience I missed.
author: Butch Trucks

quote: Drive-in banks were established so most of the cars today could see their real owners.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: When I was young, I had minimum wage jobs as a busboy, flipping burgers and parking cars.
author: Bruce Rauner

quote: From solar to electric cars, from geothermal to reconfiguring the grid, the scale of investment needed in green technologies in order to meet whatever agreements on emissions reductions are finally agreed will be immense.
author: Noreena Hertz

quote: I drive Fords, and I've driven American cars all my life, and I want to have a strong American manufacturing sector, especially in automobiles.
author: Jim DeMint

quote: I've always been attracted to cars, and driving is a completely measurable experience: if you qualify last on the grid, you're the slowest, and if you qualify first on the grid, you're the fastest. So no one can say you're slow if you're fast and no one can say you're fast if you're slow.
author: Eric Bana

quote: I just feel rejuvenated in such a big way because of these race cars I get to drive.
author: Jeff Gordon

quote: In the history of the world, no one has ever washed a rented car.
author: Lawrence Summers

quote: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.
author: Russell Baker

quote: Societies need rules that make no sense for individuals. For example, it makes no difference whether a single car drives on the left or on the right. But it makes all the difference when there are many cars!
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: The self-driving car revolution was kicked off by The 'DARPA' Grand Challenge to make an autonomous car traverse 132 mi. of a desert.
author: Fred Ehrsam

quote: You have to wait six months to purchase a fuel efficient automobile made from overseas.
author: Ed Markey

quote: My friends and neighbors were always fixing their cars. Soldiers who felt restless wanted to work on something, and they understood cars. Me, I like to look at cars but I was never really a mechanic.
author: Edward Ruscha

quote: I'm an anorak. I've always been an obsessive collector of things. Richard Briers collects stamps. I collect cars and guns, which are much more expensive, and much more difficult to store.
author: Michael Gambon

quote: Every business decision I ever made I learned from my grandfather Papa Sam. He moved here from Russia when he was a boy. He worked his way up selling newspapers and ladies' handbags, and eventually, he became Cadillac Sam, one of the biggest car dealers in Chicago.
author: Bobbi Brown

quote: Our goal was to completely change transportation. Change traffic. And make it possible to get anywhere you want to go without owning a car.
author: Logan Green

quote: I do YouTube my cars a lot.
author: T-Pain

quote: I've always wanted to buy a sports car. After the England series, I went up to my dad and said that I wanted to buy a sports car and got his consent. On his birthday, I surprised him by bringing it home. It's a Porsche Boxter Limited Edition, and my family was thrilled to see it.
author: Suresh Raina

quote: I didn't grow up with a lot of money, so my mom didn't have random money to buy me a car, and I didn't have money to have a car unless I worked, so I didn't get a car until I got my first job at 18.
author: Dominick Cruz

quote: Back in the mid-1970s, we adopted some fairly ambitious goals to improve efficiency of our cars. What did we get? We got a tremendous boost in efficiency.
author: Jay Inslee

quote: I think all males from Detroit have an obsession with cars.
author: Dax Shepard

quote: I like to smile a lot before going in the car. I make jokes, even on the grid, and then I can still manage to focus when it counts.
author: Romain Grosjean

quote: I feel comfortable around every driver out there and each driver is in charge of their own car, but you feel very secure racing the competition out there.
author: Kurt Busch

quote: I think we have to act like stars because it is expected of us. So we drive our big cars and live in our smart houses.
author: Maurice Gibb

quote: Get in the race car do what I do then go home. We don't have freedom to do anything anymore.
author: Tony Stewart

quote: We're just into toys, whether it's motorcycles or race cars or computers. I've got the Palm Pilot right here with me, I've got the world's smallest phone. Maybe it's just because I'm still a big little kid and I just love toys, you know?
author: Catherine Bell

quote: But to personally satisfy my own adrenalin needs, I've been racing cars a little bit, which has been fun.
author: Picabo Street

quote: I'm not scared of getting hurt. I'm not scared of, pretty much, anything. If you live your life scared, what's the fun in living it? If you were scared of getting hit by a car, would you still cross the street?
author: Mark Zupan

quote: I jumped 18 cars on a motorcycle, so I did almost everything.
author: David R. Ellis

quote: No action hero is more closely associated with cars than James Bond.
author: Richard Hammond

quote: Some people say it might be good for your career to die and then come back again. I have died many ways, car crashes, motorcycle crashes, etc. But, I am still alive.
author: Mark-Paul Gosselaar

quote: If you look back at history, the various Maharajas of the Indian empire actually helped support a whole British industry. The royalty in those days ordered exotic cars in huge numbers.
author: Mark Shand

quote: But my passion is racing cars. It's what I like to do in my off time.
author: Mark-Paul Gosselaar

quote: I'm not all that big on rides. I sort of like bumper cars but I don't really go to Disneyland all that much unless if have nieces and nephews or people to take.
author: Anjelica Huston

quote: It wasn't a secret that I was gay. I'd come out to my parents during my junior year of high school, on the day that I also wrecked the family car.
author: Mary Cheney

quote: Parisians overwhelmingly buy small cars. And it's not because people are petite, but because fuel is drop-dead expensive. Gasoline costs more than twice as much in Paris as in New York.
author: Serge Schmemann

quote: Buyers of powerful cars place a high premium on the exhaust note, and manufacturers spend a lot of money getting it right. At the same time, high-end cars are expected to filter out the sounds of the mundane world.
author: Serge Schmemann

quote: I always do like seeing other people dance in their cars. It's one of the things that makes me happy.
author: Ariel Gore

quote: A paparazzo once jumped out of a car and started running backward with me. I slowed down out of courtesy because she started drifting into the street. I reached out my hand and moved her back so she didn't get hit by a bus.
author: Sean Astin

quote: Ford used to come to work in a big car with two Admiral's flags, on each side of the car. His assistant would be there with his accordion, playing, Hail to the Chief.
author: Richard Widmark

quote: I have about 40 cars, of which 25 to 30 are what you might call serious.
author: Nick Mason

quote: Should we have background checks, waiting periods? To drive a car you have to pass a test that shows you know how to drive your car safely, you should have to do the same thing with guns.
author: Michael D. Barnes

quote: I've got two old Volvos, two old Subarus, and an old Ford Ranger. If you've got an old car, you've gotta have at least several old cars, 'cause one's always gonna be in the garage.
author: Rip Torn

quote: I was a little, tiny kid in the '80s, but I do remember seeing the styles of clothes, and I remember the cars from that era.
author: Scott Michael Foster

quote: The format of the race weekend is also very well thought out. We have enough practice time to get the cars well set-up and have a proper qualifying session where we can do as many laps as we like, which is great for the drivers and spectators.
author: Nigel Mansell

quote: You talk about German technocracy and you get automobiles.
author: Gordon Sinclair

quote: I drove 3,500 miles this summer on our family holiday, we drove across 10 countries. I have driven across the United States four times. I love cars, I love being in cars, I think so do most people. I want to help and support those people who have that same kind of enthusiasm for driving that I have.
author: Geoff Hoon

quote: In Paris, one is always reminded of being a foreigner. If you park your car wrong, it is not the fact that it's on the sidewalk that matters, but the fact that you speak with an accent.
author: Roman Polanski

quote: We often attribute 'understanding' and other cognitive predicates by metaphor and analogy to cars, adding machines, and other artifacts, but nothing is proved by such attributions.
author: John Searle

quote: Germans make nice cars.
author: Jason Behr

quote: I am a big car enthusiast. I totally understand guys like Jay Leno who have a thousand cars. But asking me my favorite car would be like asking my favorite song or favorite food - it changes everyday.
author: Casey James

quote: We're very good in America at talking about stuff, often stuff to buy. We tend to talk about our iPods. We tend to talk about cars or new fads.
author: Milton Glaser

quote: No illusion is more crucial than the illusion that great success and huge money buy you immunity from the common ills of mankind, such as cars that won't start.
author: Larry McMurtry

quote: See, what you're meant to do when you have a mid-life crisis is buy a fast car, aren't you? Well, I've always had fast cars. It's not that. It's the fear that you're past your best. It's the fear that the stuff you've done in the past is your best work.
author: Robbie Coltraine

quote: Image has an influence on what sort of car I will get to drive or deals that I'm offered by teams.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: We didn't care about salaries and having a nice car. We just cared about science and were really ambitious.
author: May-Britt Moser

quote: I don't buy fur coats or jewelry. I have old cars.
author: Peta Wilson

quote: We aren't addicted to oil, but our cars are.
author: James Woolsey

quote: My husband is pretty particular about his cars. In his opinion, the Mercedes are the best of the best.
author: Lauren Lee Smith

quote: Well, I always had a chauffer, because I have never driven a car in my life. I still can't drive.
author: Bud Abbott

quote: The automobile, both a cause and an effect of this decentralization, is ideally suited for our vast landscape and our generally confused and contrary commuting patterns.
author: Brock Yates

quote: I don't mean to in any way impugn the makers of Bentley, but that car is nuts. When I do drive, I drive a Toyota Prius. So driving around the streets of Albuquerque in a Bentley made me feel so fake-a-rooney.
author: Jessica Hecht

quote: Why did they keep changing guitars and amplifiers when they were perfect? They did the same things with cars, if you ask me. They forgot how to make them right, because they focused on style and bells and whistles.
author: Buddy Guy

quote: Not having to own a car has made me realize what a waste of time the automobile is.
author: Diane Johnson

quote: I think I'm actually quite a materialistic person, I value what it takes to make a car or build a nice house. Money does change things, but how it changes people depends on how they react to it.
author: Roland Gift

quote: Remote villages and communities have lost their identity, and their peace and charm have been sacrificed to that worst of abominations, the automobile.
author: James Norman Hall

quote: My dad was very successful running midgets in Texas. Then, his two drivers ran into some bad luck. People started saying that Daddy had lost his touch. That it was the cars and not the drivers. I wanted to race just to prove all those people wrong.
author: A. J. Foyt

quote: A private railroad car is not an acquired taste. One takes to it immediately.
author: Eleanor Robson Belmont
